description: Explore the environmental impact of NFTs, focusing on their carbon footprint and energy consumption related to blockchain technology. Delve into the lifecycle of NFTs, compare their emissions, and assess efforts like transitioning to Proof of Stake and eco-friendly blockchains to mitigate these effects.
keywords: NFTs, environmental impact, carbon footprint, blockchain technology, energy consumption, Proof of Stake, eco-friendly blockchains, Ethereum 2.0, sustainability
title: NFTs and Their Environmental Impact: Unveiling the Carbon Footprint of Digital Assets
